name: calendar-entry
description: Represents a BACnet Calendar Entry, which can specify a single date, a date range, or a single combination of month, week, and day for scheduling purposes.

options.name: date
options.description: A specific date or date pattern.

options.name: date-range
options.description: A range defined by a start date and an end date.

options.name: weeknday
options.description: A combination of month, week, and day.
